name: Hero WWII: Shooter Army
description:
Hero WWII: Shooter Army is shooting games where WW2 US army commando will help the US army firing squad in WW2 war shooting battle to be the last unknown player standing in world war II survival battlegrounds war shooting games.You can kill your enemy in one man us army commando game of modern strike sniper shooting. However, it is recommended to use high weaponry in all call of sniper stealth missions of this high class fps sniper shooting rescue game.
features:
World war II exciting stealth missions
Fort war survival game in World War II battleground!
Realistic 3D graphics of world conqueror game
World war 2 Sniper gun shooter missions
